address: 195 Broadway, New York, NY 10007, United States
description: HarperCollins Publishers is one of the world's largest publishing companies and a subsidiary of News Corp. With a rich history dating back to 1817, HarperCollins publishes a wide range of fiction, non-fiction, and children's books.

address: 1745 Broadway, New York, NY 10019, United States
description: Penguin Random House is an international publishing company formed from the merger of Penguin Books and Random House. It publishes fiction and non-fiction books across various genres and is known for its diverse range of authors.

address: 1230 Avenue of the Americas, New York, NY 10020, United States
description: Simon & Schuster, founded in 1924, is a major American publishing company. It publishes a wide array of books including fiction, non-fiction, and children's books, catering to a broad audience.

address: 120 Broadway, New York, NY 10271, United States
description: Macmillan Publishers, founded in 1843, is a global trade publishing company. It publishes a wide range of books under various imprints, including fiction, non-fiction, and academic works.

address: 1290 Avenue of the Americas, New York, NY 10104, United States
description: Hachette Book Group is a leading trade publisher in the United States. It publishes books across various genres, including fiction, non-fiction, and children's books, through its numerous imprints.

address: 1 London Bridge Street, London SE1 9GF, United Kingdom
description: HarperCollins UK is the British publishing division of HarperCollins Publishers. It publishes a wide range of books, including fiction, non-fiction, and children's literature, catering to readers in the UK and beyond.
